sn3.5:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho raja pasenadi kosalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn3.5:1.3: “idha mayham, bhante, rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
sn3.5:1.4: ‘kesam nu kho rakkhito atta, kesam arakkhito atta’ti?
sn3.5:1.6: ‘ye kho keci kayena duccaritam caranti, vacaya duccaritam caranti, manasa duccaritam caranti;
sn3.5:1.8: Kincapi te hatthikayo va rakkheyya, assakayo va rakkheyya, rathakayo va rakkheyya, pattikayo va rakkheyya;
sn3.5:1.11: Bahira hesa rakkha, nesa rakkha ajjhattika;
sn3.5:1.13: Ye ca kho keci kayena sucaritam caranti, vacaya sucaritam caranti, manasa sucaritam caranti;
sn3.5:1.15: Kincapi te neva hatthikayo rakkheyya, na assakayo rakkheyya, na rathakayo rakkheyya, na pattikayo rakkheyya;
sn3.5:1.18: Ajjhattika hesa rakkha, nesa rakkha bahira;
